CustomField.description: Score 0-10 scale. 10 being the best scenario for Ubiquity, and 1 being the worst.
CustomField.formula: (VALUE( TEXT (Revenue_Opportunity__c )) + VALUE( TEXT (Distribution__c )) + VALUE( TEXT (Product_Fit__c )) + VALUE( TEXT (Funding__c )) + VALUE( TEXT (Timing_to_Decision__c )))/5
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Score 0-10 scale. 10 being the best scenario for Ubiquity, and 1 being the worst.
CustomField.label: IPP Score
